import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "../logo.svg"; import { Caroussel } from "./Caroussel"; // Assuming the Caroussel component is in a separate file export const Navbar = () => { const [isDropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => { setDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen); }; return (
  • Home
  • {isDropdownOpen && (
    • Dashboard
    • Overview
    • My downloads
    )}
  • Services
  • Pricing
); };
